verses.roman:
nityānanda-gosāñire pāṭhāila gauḍa-deśe
teṅho gauḍa-deśa bhāsāila prema-rase

synonyms: nityānanda-gosāñire—Nityānanda Gosvāmī; pāṭhāila—sent; gauḍa-deśe—to Bengal; teṅho—He; gauḍa-deśa—the tract of land known as Gauḍa-deśa, or Bengal; bhāsāila—overflooded; prema-rase—with ecstatic love of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sent Nityānanda Prabhu from Jagannātha Purī to Bengal, which was known as Gauḍa-deśa, and Lord Nityānanda Prabhu overflooded this country with the transcendental loving service of the Lord.
